content.prompt: The widespread acceptance of the concept of Germany’s boundaries reflected in the poem would lead most directly to which of the following?

choices.label: The partition of Poland between Austria, Prussia, and Russia
Conflict between Bismarck’s Prussia and neighboring powers
The creation of the Dual Monarchy
French resentment at the terms of the peace settlement at the Congress of Vienna

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
